headline: As Tehran and Washington Stare Each Other Down, ISIS Stands to Gain
abstract: The American assassination of a top Iranian commander may make it impossible for American forces to stay in Iraq. That could ease an ISIS comeback.
lead_paragraph: For the militants of the Islamic State, the American drone strike that killed the Iranian commander Qassim Suleimani was a two-for-one victory.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
